title: Optimum Nutrition logo font identity
content:
Hi, just thought I'd ask what the font is for the logo itself (ON)

[https://sportandsupplements.com/product\_images/uploaded\_images/Optimum\_N...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101004658/https:/sportandsupplements.com/product_images/uploaded_images/Optimum_Nutrition.jpg "https://sportandsupplements.com/product\_images/uploaded\_images/Optimum\_Nutrition.jpg")

It's probably something quite straight forward that I've overlooked, I'd just like some clarification from somebody more informed than myself, thanks in advance. Happy identifying :)
author: Joe-Mason

comments.content: Straight forward answer: [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101004658/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/impact)/ [Haettenschweiler](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101004658/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/haettenschweiler) (mainly because of /O counter) slanted and a bit squooshed should do the job. You could still use some [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101004658/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica) (Black Condensed, Compressed, Extra Compressed...).
